name: Diorama - VFX
description:
Prototype realised with Unreal Engine and Substance during my studies at the Gaming Campus.

The goal was to learn how to use particles, materials  with substance, and also dynamic shaders.

With this project i also learnt a lot about lightings and post processing.

The project is not really "playable" but you can roam around, its mainly for display more then anything else.

Feel free to leave me feedbacks, and tell me what you think about it.
